PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-01812008-01-31,  ,  ,  PSEP, 
ActCustoms Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the REPORTING OF IMPORTED GOODS REGULATIONS by revising the definition for the term cargo container in section 2 is amended to be aligned with international definitions. The minimum internal capacity of containers subject to the Regulations is reduced to one cubic metre. The nature and use of containers is defined and ancillary equipment and demountable bodies are now included as being part of the container.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0025 Publication Date: 2008-02-20
